Fanning the Flames.name: Fanning the Flames
Fanning the Flames.flavor: As flames envelop one of your enemies, you cause the flames to swell and spread to another.
Fanning the Flames.target: One creature taking ongoing fire damage
Fanning the Flames.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and any ongoing fire damage the target is taking increases by 5.
Fanning the Flames.effect: Make a secondary attack in an area burst 1 centered on the primary target.

Furious Immolation.name: Furious Immolation
Furious Immolation.flavor: You summon a titanic column of flame that draws everything nearby toward destruction.
Furious Immolation.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes 15 fire damage (a creature can take this damage only once per turn). Make a secondary attack as an area burst 4 with the same origin square.
Furious Immolation.secondaryOnHit: You pull the target 2 squares toward the attackâ€™s origin square.
Furious Immolation.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn, and you repeat the secondary attack.

Burning Transformation.name: Burning Transformation
Burning Transformation.flavor: You become a creature of pure flame.
Burning Transformation.effect: You transform into a creature of fire until the end of the encounter. While in this form you gain the following benefits and limitations: You are insubstantial, you can shift 1 square as a minor action, you are immune to fire, you gain a +5 power bonus to damage rolls with arcane fire attacks, and you cannot use any attack power without the fire keyword. Additionally, whenever an enemy hits you with a melee attack, it takes fire damage equal to 5 + your Intelligence modifier.
